comments: Awesome professor! Has a German accents, so requires you to pay attention. Very willing to help; holds office hours regularly; hold extra when he assigns an essay. Good about extensions & just nice overall.

This guy is a superb lecturer and so hilarious sometimes. He has a Swiss accent, but it only adds to the character of the class. There are two papers, which are fairly simple and easy, and based on understanding the Main concepts of class... and a final where he gives you 6 of the possible 3 essays to write. The TA\'s are generally good. AMAZING !!
